answerText: thunderstorms [or electrical storm; or thundershower; prompt on storms][10] This thunderstorm formation generally forms along a cold front because the cold front lifts air ahead of it, which rises unaided to the point where condensation occurs. These mesoscale formations can produce downdrafts more than 4 kilometers in extent.

subject: Science
question: Question: The formation of these weather systems is heavily influenced by the Madden-Julian oscillation. For 10 points each: [10] Name these weather systems singularly associated with lightning and cumulonimbus clouds.
